thread.title: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty Expands Into Florida Panhandle Region
thread.title_full: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty Expands Into Florida Panhandle Region

author: PRWEB
title: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty Expands Into Florida Panhandle Region
text:
This agreement provides PenFed Realty with an immediate presence in Pensacola and the opportunity to grow by leveraging our existing infrastructure and rebranding the new operation under the Berkshire Hathaway name. PENSACOLA, Fla. (PRWEB) July 15, 2015
Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty announced today that it entered into an agreement with John S. Carr & Company in Pensacola, Fla. With the completion of this transaction, PenFed Realty strengthens its presence in the Northwest region of Florida by expanding operations in the Florida panhandle.
PenFed Realty President and CEO Shashi Vohra said, “This agreement provides PenFed Realty with an immediate presence in Pensacola and the opportunity to grow by leveraging our existing infrastructure and rebranding the new operation under the Berkshire Hathaway name.”
According to Florida Regional Vice President Royce Mitchell, Carr & Company has served the Northwest Florida and Southern Alabama regions for more than 30 years and has a stellar reputation. This new affiliation brings two offices and 30 top sales professionals under the Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty umbrella.
“The sales professionals will now have access to greater resources, a state-of-the-art global network platform, plus expanded reach through a national referral system; enabling them to serve buyers and sellers even better,” Mitchell explained.
Mitchell shared that Pensacola is a strategic market for PenFed Realty and a natural expansion of its real estate operations. It already has an office in Santa Rosa Beach on Highway 30A, just 60 miles east of the Pensacola office. Another office is located in Niceville, Fla.
“This market has a strong military influence,” added Mitchell. “It is home to a Naval Air Station, the Blue Angels and the National Naval Air Museum; with many active duty and retired military living in the community—a community we want to support and serve.”
The Pensacola office is located in downtown, 17 W. Cedar St., Pensacola. The office number is 850-434-2244. A second office is located at Pensacola Nature Trail, 8775 Foxtail Loop.
About Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty
Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices PenFed Realty is a full-service real estate company with annual sales volume of $2.8 billion with 1,700 sales agents and 50+ offices providing complete real estate services nationwide. PenFed Realty is a wholly owned subsidiary of PenFed Credit Union (PenFed) and a member of the Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices brokerage network, operated by HSF Affiliates LLC. To find out more about PenFed Realty, please visit PenFedRealty.com . Equal Opportunity Employer: m/f/v/d.
